ComicInfo.Summary:
Deep Space was filled with unknown dangers. Many craft did not return from interstellar trips. All disappearances were logged, and investigated as far as possible, but usually ended up categorised as lost - presumed destroyed.
Commander William G. Brent was Captain of an Earth Deep Space Monitor, Wanderer, which it picked up an object on the scanners. It was a....Space Ghost.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-15 09:08:55. [CVDB264677]

ComicInfo.Title: Space Ghost!
